definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mock, deride; also (Niph.) stammer, poet. (NH Hiph. id.; Targum [[לְעֵג]] Aph. id.; l9eg stutter (cf. NH [[לִגְלֵג]] mock, Targum [[לַגְלֵג]] id.; Syr. lagleg stutter, Ar. lajlaja id.));—

[[לֽעֵג]] Pr 17:5, Je 20:7; —mock, deride, have in derision,  of Jerus. triumphing over enemy (c. [[לְ]] pers. vel rei) 2Ki 19:21 = Is 37:22 (‖[[בזה]]); of the innocent Job 22:19 (‖[[שׂמח]]); of God (c. [[לְ]]) Job 9:23, Ps 2:4, Ps 59:9; abs. of wisdom Pr 1:26 (‖[[שׂחק]]); of wicked (c. definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִלְעַג לָשׁוֹן]]…[[עַם]] Is 33:19 a people stammering of tongue (i.e. barbarians, cf. v:a; but rd. [[נעלג]] [√ [[עלג]]] Gr:Monatsschr. 1884, 45; ‖[[עִמְקֵי שָׂפָה]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (late; cf. NH) Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּלְעֵג]] Ne 3:33; 2 ms. [[תַּלְעִיג]] Job 21:3; 3 mpl. [[יַלְעִגוּ]] Ps 22:8, [[וַיַּלְעִגוּ]] Ne 2:19; Pt. [[מַלְעִגִים]] 2Ch 30:10; —mock, deride, always in bad sense: c. [[לְ]] pers. Ne 2:19 (‖[[בזה]]), Ps 22:8; c. [[עַלם]] pers. Ne 3:33; c. [[בְּ]] pers. 2Ch 30:10 (‖[[השׂחיק]]); abs. Job 21:3.—So also [[יִלְעִיג]] (or [[יִלְעַג]]) Pr 18:1 for MT [[יִתְגַּלַּע]] Gr:l. c (v. [[גלע]], p. 166 supra).
